123211.content:
Gohan had gotten off of Jess, which allowed her to breathe, but also allowed her to experience pain, Lots of pain. Her legs felt like they got run over by a train, her head felt like it was beating itself up with a hammer, and her arms felt like noodles. Jess felt the urge to cry, but her pride would not allow that, she then looked up to see Gohan looking down on her in sympathy and guilt. Then Gohan's God like voice spoke to her "SORRY LITTLE GUY, MAN YOUR A TOUGH ONE TO SURVIVE THAT, WHAT TO DO NOW." Right after saying that, the half sayings stomach rumbled, like a roar of a lion. Gohan patted his stomach, as if he were petting a dog, and then Gohan looked at the "bug" then his stomach, then at the bug again, all the while gaining a nervous smile.

He looked at the bug and thought " should I do this, can I do this, eat a living thing alive" gohan looked down in thought, tapping his feet up and down, while his stomach kept grumbling, as if it had a mind of its own, telling his master to eat the miserable bug. Jess tried to get up or crawl, but her body would not allow it. It seems her life was now in Gohan's hands, not that they haven't been so far. Gohan then looked down at Jess, his pure black pupils looking at her as if looking into her soul, gohan then got closer and closer until he was inches away from her body. He opened his mouth, allowing Jess to see his long tounge, sharp huge teeth, and his throat, Jess could easily fit in there. Then he spoke and said?
123211.title: Jess alive

1232111.content:
Gohan's hand wrapped around Jess's body, causing her to go pale and wale around. She hit his hand as hard as she could but it had no effect on him. She was brought up to his face, his big eyes trained on her and then his mouth opened wide. It looked like a humongous cave to her, saliva and drool dropping down on to his slimy tongue. Gohan then brought out his tongue and licked her slowly, with the saliva and drool drenching her. Jess was stunned by this and tried to talk, to beg him to stop this, but his saliva was causing her to not be able to talk and her size wasn't helping either.

Gohan put his tongue back and made an audible gulp. Jess cringed at this and then remembered what was happening, causing her to flail around again. It was of course useless, but she kept trying anyway but the giant paid her no mind. He then opened his mouth and dropped her in his mouth. Jess landed on his tongue, and she then felt it move around, causing her to hit his cheeks, the roof of his mouth as well. She got even more drenched and then heard him gulp, she slid down his throat and the muscles started squishing her. She fell through a ring of muscle and landed in his stomach juices.

Gohan rubbed his gut, loving the feeling of the bug in his mouth, sliding down his throat, where he traced his finger as the bug went down, and then felling it go in his belly. "Man who knew a bug could taste so good" his gut then rumbled, as if it agreed with him which caused him to giggle. Gohan then went out and lifted his gi, putting his hand on his gut and patted it, like petting a dog. The half sayian then looked at his rear and muttered " well bug, looks like your gonna come out my butt, so have- gohan then heard something. He looked around wondering if he was hearing something, but then he heard it again. He then heightened his senses and heard the voice again, but now he heard it coming from inside his belly. He then spoke " hello, who's there"?
Jess perked up when she heard him say that " yes gohan can you hear me"!

"Yes I can, umm don't worry, I'm not mad but why are you in my stomach"?
" I was the "bug" you ate.
Gohan's eyes went wide " oh, um I'm sorry, don't worry I'll get you out".

Gohan used telekinesis, something his mentor Piccolo taught him and got her out of his body. He gently put her on his palm, and they both started at each other. Gohan couldn't believe how small she was and he was still getting over the fact that he ATE her.

"Soooo, whats your name". Gohan figured he should start with getting her name first. She flashed him a nervous smile " my name is Jess" he then have her a big smile " Jess huh, that's a pretty name, so I'm sorry for eating you and umm" Gohan's face went red with embarrassment and Jess let out a giggle at seeing this gigantic god like figure be so uncomfortable.

" For Sitting on me, hey it's cool I probably would have done the same thing". Golan let out a sigh and said " thanks, you are a really understanding person." Gohan's smile evaporated as he realised something, " wait why are you so tiny". Jess then explained the situation and after it was over Gohan gave her a sympathetic look "I'm sorry this must be scary for you, but don't worry I have a very smart friend who can help you"

Jess with a serious look said " Gohan to be honest I would rather stay here with you"
Gohan gave her a look of surprise and he replied back to her " are you sure, I mean your family- " my family treats me like garbage, please let me stay here with you, I promise I won't bother you". Gohan looked down at her and gave her a happy grin " well how can I say no to your pretty face, of course you can stay." Jess jumped up in the air and hugged him, well his chest to be more precise.

Gohan smiled and hugged her back, gently of course.
1232111.title: Sorry, but you look tasty

123212.content:
Jesse's body had been squashed, with her face now looking like a monster, her bones crushed to pieces, and a huge puddle of blood began forming. Gohan felt his heart drop, feeling sad about what he had to do, but felt better knowing the bug was now in a better place. Still, gohan looked sad, not because it was dead, but that it felt almost good, having something so tiny under his control, the bug at the mercy of his bottom. He looked at his butt and then out his yard, he got a sadistic grin " I think it's time to find another bug, introduce it to my great bottom.

Gohan then walked outside, swaying his hips so his butt could move and bounce around, inviting any bug who would want to be on his butt.
123212.title: Jess dead
